function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social interaction in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased chance for disease propagation and transmission within physical retail spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementation of technologies that facilitate social interaction while minimizing physical contact.","Technologies":"Virtual or digitalized sensory experiences, interactive communication platforms, touchless technology.","People":"Customers, retail staff, visitors to physical retail spaces.","Owner":"Physical retailers, technology developers, public health agencies."},{"Description":"High cost of implementing complex technologies for social interaction and sensory input in online shops.","Impact":"Financial burden on businesses, potential inequality in access to technology-enhanced experiences.","Mitigation":"Exploration of cost-effective technologies, potential subsidies for small businesses, alternative methods of enhancing online customer experience.","Technologies":"Cost-effective virtual and augmented reality solutions, interactive online platforms, sensory feedback technology.","People":"Online retailers, customers, small business owners.","Owner":"Technology developers, government agencies, e-commerce platforms."},{"Description":"Indirect and direct impact of technology implementation on customer satisfaction and shopping experience.","Impact":"Potential decrease in customer satisfaction if technologies do not align with customer preferences, potential resistance to virtual/digitalized experiences.","Mitigation":"Comprehensive research to understand customer preferences, flexibility in offering technology-enhanced and traditional shopping experiences.","Technologies":"Customer preference analytics, adaptive technology solutions, personalized virtual experiences.","People":"Customers, online retail staff, technology developers.","Owner":"Online retailers, market researchers, technology developers."}]}
